snippet: Documents released Wednesday by the Franklin County prosecutor’s office included, for the first time, accounts by the officers involved, all of whom said they had felt threatened.
abstract: Report reveals that Antonio Zambrano-Montes, who was shot to death by police officers in Pasco, Wash, in February, was likely wielding rock at time he was killed.
lead_paragraph: Documents released Wednesday by the Franklin County prosecutor’s office included, for the first time, accounts by the officers involved, all of whom said they had felt threatened.

headline.main: Report Concludes Police Shooting Victim in Washington State Probably Had a Rock
headline.print_headline: Report Concludes Police Shooting Victim in Washington State Probably Had a Rock
